name: Middleburgh AutoDrive
description:
93 Waypoints covering Fields, Farms, Productions and Fill and Sell Points.

To make sure that some of the automatic doors open without your tractors getting caught on them, you will need 'Collision Detection' turned on in the AutoDrive menu.

  • 'Pig Food Factory' - unable to use semi to unload due to collision on the concrete barries.
  • Folder name 'Non-Farm Animals' relates to the Animal pens on the main road near Farm 2.
  • In Farm 4 there is no trigger (that I can find after plenty of attempts to find) for Milk or the Slurry from the Pig Barn.
  • In Farm 5 there is again, no trigger for the slurry at the Pig Barn.
  • On the route to the Pig Barn, Sheep Pasture and the Cow Pasture, I have had to make it a 2-way route and really close to the edge of the field as there is a 'hidden collision' somewhere and this is the only way I can get it to run through to the area.

There are a few Waypoints that you won't be able to use for automation, purely because of the positioning of triggers near fences and other hidden issues. These will need to be unloaded manually!

  • Spinnery Production Unload
  • Bakery 1 and Bakery 2 Production Unloads
  • Clothing Company Sell Point
  • Clothing Factory Unload
  • Walmart Sell Point
  • Farm 2 - Oil Mill Load/Unload
  • Farm 2 - Manure Pit
  • Non-Farm Animals - Horse Straw (Manual)
  • Farm 4 - Winery Farm 4 Load
  • Farm 5 - Chicken Unload
  • Farm 5 - Pig Food & Straw Unload

Please let me know if you find anything wrong or doesn't work and I will try and get a fix done and new version uploaded.

Please use the comments section or you can find me on Discord @ https://discord.gg/wWyH4GgpPP
